item.title: Jabra emphasizes the importance of educating and incentivizing employees to guarantee the success of UC
item.description: Jabra, a company that makes audio solutions, believes the tech industry needs to rethink its definition of success for unified communications (UC) deployments. Source: Jabra website. Currently, only 10% of companies use UC. This is because employees don’t want to give up their current tools and ways of working. Companies are spending a lot of money on UC, but employees don’t see how it can help them be more productive.
